      • getTile

        public static Tile getTile(int ident)
        Constructs and returns a tile object. Use one of the static constants of the class to get a tile with corresponding attributes and icon. The method returns: WFB, Plank, Post. All of the classes returned are subclasses of Tile and hold their special features.
        Parameters:
        ident -
        Returns:
